verses.verse: And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and they removed <S%H5265><s%> from Shittim <S%H7851><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, he and all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they lodged <S%H3885><s%> there before they passed over <S%H5674><s%>.
And it came to pass after <S%H7097><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the officers <S%H7860><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the midst of the camp <S%H4264><s%>;

and they commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When ye see <S%H7200><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> it <S%H5265><s%>, then ye shall remove from your place <S%H4725><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> after it <S%H310><s%>.

Yet there shall be a space <S%H7350><s%> between you and it <S%H505><s%>, about two thousand cubits <S%H520><s%> by measure <S%H4060><s%>: come not near <S%H7126><s%> unto it <S%H3045><s%>, that ye may know the way <S%H1870><s%> by which ye must go <S%H3212><s%>; for ye have not passed <S%H5674><s%> this way <S%H1870><s%> heretofore <S%H8543><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves <S%H4279><s%>; for to-morrow Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> among you <S%H7130><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto the priests <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>. And they took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, This day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to magnify <S%H1431><s%> thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H4872><s%>, as I was with Moses, so I will be with thee.

And thou shalt command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When ye are come <S%H935><s%> to the brink <S%H7097><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, ye shall stand still <S%H5975><s%> in the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Come hither <S%H5066><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Hereby ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and that he will without fail drive out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%>, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>.
Behold <S%H727><s%>, the ark of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%> passeth over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.
Now therefore take <S%H3947><s%> you twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, for every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3709><s%>, when the soles of the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>, shall rest <S%H5117><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%>, even the waters <S%H4325><s%> that come down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%>; and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> heap <S%H5067><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5971><s%>, when the people removed <S%H5265><s%> from their tents <S%H168><s%>, to pass over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> being before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>;

and when they that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were come <S%H935><s%> unto the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were dipped <S%H2881><s%> in the brink <S%H7097><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> (for the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> overfloweth <S%H4390><s%> all its banks <S%H1415><s%> all the time <S%H3117><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>,)

that the waters <S%H4325><s%> which came down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%>, and <S%H259><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> heap <S%H5067><s%>, a great <S%H3966><s%> way off <S%H7368><s%>, at Adam <S%H121><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> that is beside <S%H6654><s%> Zarethan <S%H6891><s%>; and those that went down <S%H3381><s%> toward the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>, even the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>, were wholly cut off <S%H3772><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> right against Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> firm <S%H3559><s%> on dry ground <S%H2724><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> on dry ground <S%H2724><s%>, until all the nation <S%H1471><s%> were passed <S%H5674><s%> clean <S%H8552><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.
